comments.body: Be good to break this string into shorter lines. Breaking the index bracket to get a continuation line is just weird, but that is for another day.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1156,1160 @@    # NPY_CHAR compatibility, NPY_STRING with itemsize 1
    cppmacros[
        m] = '#define %s(v,dims) (PyArray_New(&PyArray_Type, 1, dims, NPY_STRING, NULL, v, 1, NPY_ARRAY_CARRAY, NULL))' % (m)

comments.body: This macro was previously a compile error, as it forgot the last argument of `setitem`. Ditto for the complex version.
NumPy version 13? Was that supposed to be 0.13? @mattip
